## arth-lib-ethers package

## Classes

|  Class | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [BlockPolledLiquityStore](./arth-lib-ethers.blockpolledliquitystore.md) | Ethers-based [LiquityStore](./arth-lib-base.liquitystore.md) that updates state whenever there's a new block. |
|  [EthersLiquity](./arth-lib-ethers.ethersliquity.md) | Convenience class that combines multiple interfaces of the library in one object. |
|  [EthersTransactionFailedError](./arth-lib-ethers.etherstransactionfailederror.md) | Thrown by [EthersLiquity](./arth-lib-ethers.ethersliquity.md) in case of transaction failure. |
|  [PopulatableEthersLiquity](./arth-lib-ethers.populatableethersliquity.md) | Ethers-based implementation of [PopulatableLiquity](./arth-lib-base.populatableliquity.md)<!-- -->. |
|  [PopulatedEthersLiquityTransaction](./arth-lib-ethers.populatedethersliquitytransaction.md) | A transaction that has been prepared for sending. |
|  [PopulatedEthersRedemption](./arth-lib-ethers.populatedethersredemption.md) | A redemption transaction that has been prepared for sending. |
|  [ReadableEthersLiquity](./arth-lib-ethers.readableethersliquity.md) | Ethers-based implementation of [ReadableLiquity](./arth-lib-base.readableliquity.md)<!-- -->. |
|  [SendableEthersLiquity](./arth-lib-ethers.sendableethersliquity.md) | Ethers-based implementation of [SendableLiquity](./arth-lib-base.sendableliquity.md)<!-- -->. |
|  [SentEthersLiquityTransaction](./arth-lib-ethers.sentethersliquitytransaction.md) | A transaction that has already been sent. |
|  [UnsupportedNetworkError](./arth-lib-ethers.unsupportednetworkerror.md) | Thrown when trying to connect to a network where Liquity is not deployed. |

## Interfaces

|  Interface | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [BlockPolledLiquityStoreExtraState](./arth-lib-ethers.blockpolledliquitystoreextrastate.md) | Extra state added to [LiquityStoreState](./arth-lib-base.liquitystorestate.md) by [BlockPolledLiquityStore](./arth-lib-ethers.blockpolledliquitystore.md)<!-- -->. |
|  [EthersCallOverrides](./arth-lib-ethers.etherscalloverrides.md) | Optional parameters taken by [ReadableEthersLiquity](./arth-lib-ethers.readableethersliquity.md) functions. |
|  [EthersLiquityConnection](./arth-lib-ethers.ethersliquityconnection.md) | Information about a connection to the Liquity protocol. |
|  [EthersLiquityConnectionOptionalParams](./arth-lib-ethers.ethersliquityconnectionoptionalparams.md) | Optional parameters of [ReadableEthersLiquity.connect()](./arth-lib-ethers.readableethersliquity.connect_1.md) and [EthersLiquity.connect()](./arth-lib-ethers.ethersliquity.connect_1.md)<!-- -->. |
|  [EthersLiquityWithStore](./arth-lib-ethers.ethersliquitywithstore.md) | Variant of [EthersLiquity](./arth-lib-ethers.ethersliquity.md) that exposes a [LiquityStore](./arth-lib-base.liquitystore.md)<!-- -->. |
|  [EthersTransactionOverrides](./arth-lib-ethers.etherstransactionoverrides.md) | Optional parameters taken by [EthersLiquity](./arth-lib-ethers.ethersliquity.md) transaction functions. |
|  [ReadableEthersLiquityWithStore](./arth-lib-ethers.readableethersliquitywithstore.md) | Variant of [ReadableEthersLiquity](./arth-lib-ethers.readableethersliquity.md) that exposes a [LiquityStore](./arth-lib-base.liquitystore.md)<!-- -->. |
